channel.title: Runescape Website Template Creation(QUESTION)
channel.description: What would be the best software to create my own RS Website?

item.title: Runescape Website Template Creation(QUESTION)
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:6, topic:478517”][quote author=RSCShadow link=topic=596739.msg4202038#msg4202038 date=1358357476]

If you’re going into the programming side I suggest nothing less than PHP, the very same I used when we done our remake. If you wish a truly authentic feel you can add an apache handle so that .ws is manifested as php.
[/quote]Apache isn’t the only webserver with rewrite.

I know, but isn’t apache the most common? Or am I wrong there. I’m not 100% sure on that but I know it is very, very popular.[/quote]It is the most common but it certainly isn’t the best.

Read full topic

If you’re going into the programming side I suggest nothing less than PHP, the very same I used when we done our remake. If you wish a truly authentic feel you can add an apache handle so that .ws is manifested as php.
[/quote]Apache isn’t the only webserver with rewrite.[/quote]
I know, but isn’t apache the most common? Or am I wrong there. I’m not 100% sure on that but I know it is very, very popular.

item.title: Runescape Website Template Creation(QUESTION)
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

What do you mean? Backend or frontend development? If you’re just creating a template with no programming involved that I suggest you download some form of programming text editor and learn simple CSS and HTML, don’t touch dreamweaver.

If you’re going into the programming side I suggest nothing less than PHP, the very same I used when we done our remake. If you wish a truly authentic feel you can add an apache handle so that .ws is manifested as php.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Website Template Creation(QUESTION)
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Create your own so you can be creative with it instead of making a website that looks similar to another popular site.
